results.content:
Instructor gives analogies that has no reasoning. It feels like the instructor explains to a 10-year-old child. 

Instead, he could reference the source code or pseudocode of the source code to explain such stuff, or nothing. But those simple analogies feel annoying. 

Given stars are for the length of the course. But I would never like to take a course from this instructor. Sorry.

results.content:
It teaches you everything you need to know about d3, in the right order, without assuming too much previous knowledge. You do need a basic background of html and javascript, and you should know how to add d3 to your setup.

I recommend you follow some of the basic tutorials in the d3 website and get a general overview of what d3 does and how it works, then you can do this course and you will surely get enough knowledge to do whatever you need with

results.content: After taking D3 classes on LinkedIn Learning and SuperHi, reviewing the D3 course on Codecademy, this course is hands-down the most comprehensive, well structured, easy to digest D3 course I have ever taken. It will help you lay a very solid foundation on D3. The instructor impresses me the most with his thorough, easy-to-understand explanations of the meanings of the functions as well as some mathematical concepts, which often get ignored in similar courses which leave you half way through the learning process and find it difficult to replicate the code or adapt the learnings to your personal projects. I really appreciate the instructor and will follow his other courses as well.
results.content_html: After taking D3 classes on LinkedIn Learning and SuperHi, reviewing the D3 course on Codecademy, this course is hands-down the most comprehensive, well structured, easy to digest D3 course I have ever taken. It will help you lay a very solid foundation on D3. The instructor impresses me the most with his thorough, easy-to-understand explanations of the meanings of the functions as well as some mathematical concepts, which often get ignored in similar courses which leave you half way through the learning process and find it difficult to replicate the code or adapt the learnings to your personal projects. I really appreciate the instructor and will follow his other courses as well.

results.content: Great course, breaks it all down without dipping too much into explaining the JS. If youre taking this course, you should know a decent little chunk of js. But I feel very comfortable using d3 now. I know the steps. I know what to look for each step of the way (need the docs a lot but thats a matter of time). Overall 5/5. If the speech seems slow just use 1.25 or 1.5 and it works great.

results.content: This is an excellent course, covering a graphics system that is extremely powerful, broad in scope, and not at all easy to pick up without instruction (I tried).  The online tutorials fail totally to give an overall view of d3, SVG and visualization methods, which this course provides.  I am very glad to have found it, and I am sure it will save a great deal of time in my projects, plus provide me with the tools and references to do a much better and more complete, polished job than would have been possible with the course.
results.content_html: This is an excellent course, covering a graphics system that is extremely powerful, broad in scope, and not at all easy to pick up without instruction (I tried). The online tutorials fail totally to give an overall view of d3, SVG and visualization methods, which this course provides. I am very glad to have found it, and I am sure it will save a great deal of time in my projects, plus provide me with the tools and references to do a much better and more complete, polished job than would have been possible with the course.

results.content:

Always remember that 'data drives visualization and not the other way round'.

results.content:
Ottimo corso e capace insegnante.
Gli argomenti, specialmente all'inizio, sono correttamente introdotti e spiegati. La gran parte degli aspetti e comandi, dopo esser stata descritta con chiarezza, viene subito mostrata visivamente. Molte esempi riprendono applicazioni concrete e pratiche, così come le soluzioni alle difficoltà che si incontrerebbero durante la realizzazione pratica.
Insegnate preciso e gradevole, la velocità è adeguata. Verso la fine, per via della mole di argomenti e concetti accumulati ed applicati, si tende a dover spesso sospendere la riproduzione e tornare indietro per ripassare o riascoltare.
La mancanza di sottotitoli reali (sono generati automaticamente e spesso sono fuorvianti) e della loro localizzazione impone spesso di tornare indietro e riascoltare alcune frasi e concetti.
Consigliatissimo ed esaustivo.
results.content_html:

results.content: Great course. It is the right place to understand and use D3.
results.content_html: Great course. It is the right place to understand and use D3.

results.content:
This course is great.
I've tried a few other D3 courses before this one and none were as informative as this one.
I really like how the instructor tries to visualize some of the concepts and manages to get his point across very well.
Having had some prior knowledge od D3 this course actually helped me finally get the hang of working with this librabry on my own.
results.content_html:

results.content:
From having zero experience with D3 to creating some decent charts. D3 it's a beast on it's own, not a regular charting library.

Explanations provided guide you with some base knowledge, and progress step by step into the D3 possibilities.

I cannot be more happy for taking this course. The instructor applies this style to other courses I took with him.

thanks,

results.content: Very easy to follow, and the instructor does a great job simplifying this extensive library!
results.content_html: Very easy to follow, and the instructor does a great job simplifying this extensive library!

results.content: Great course if you want to get familiar with d3 library. Plenty of examples and great explanation of tricky parts, though closer to the end you will still have to read documentation to understand the material.
results.content_html: Great course if you want to get familiar with d3 library. Plenty of examples and great explanation of tricky parts, though closer to the end you will still have to read documentation to understand the material.

results.content: I had completed an in depth course on CSS and HTML - this does not seem enough for this course. I think it was because my knowledge was too basic in JS that held me back. Perhaps this should be advised before starting the course - that one needs more than a basic understanding of JS.
results.content_html: I had completed an in depth course on CSS and HTML - this does not seem enough for this course. I think it was because my knowledge was too basic in JS that held me back. Perhaps this should be advised before starting the course - that one needs more than a basic understanding of JS.

results.content: Update the last 2 sections 8 and 9 to have accurate descriptions and functional examples.  But overall, really good for beginners.
results.content_html: Update the last 2 sections 8 and 9 to have accurate descriptions and functional examples. But overall, really good for beginners.

results.content: Very good course to learn in a short time the basics of data visualization with the powerful lib D3js. Thank you!
results.content_html: Very good course to learn in a short time the basics of data visualization with the powerful lib D3js. Thank you!

results.content:
This is a very useful course if you want to learn using D3. It will help you to use D3 in your projects as a user. It won't bother you with the inner workings of D3. 

I think it touches the most important subjects, although I might have liked some guidelines about the preparation of the data, what data structures work and what structures aren't very useful. 

I can recommend this course if you want to start using D3!
results.content_html:
This is a very useful course if you want to learn using D3. It will help you to use D3 in your projects as a user. It won't bother you with the inner workings of D3.

I think it touches the most important subjects, although I might have liked some guidelines about the preparation of the data, what data structures work and what structures aren't very useful.

I can recommend this course if you want to start using D3!

results.content: It is a good course which provides a lot of information which other courses on D3 do not provide. It is also based on D3 V4 which uses the latest codebase. There are some areas which are not covered in detail. One of them is animation. My big pain point is animations, especially doughnut animations when they appear on the screen (not when data is updated). Overall, I will recommend the course to anybody learning D3. And a small tip, view the course at 125% speed :)
results.content_html: It is a good course which provides a lot of information which other courses on D3 do not provide. It is also based on D3 V4 which uses the latest codebase. There are some areas which are not covered in detail. One of them is animation. My big pain point is animations, especially doughnut animations when they appear on the screen (not when data is updated). Overall, I will recommend the course to anybody learning D3. And a small tip, view the course at 125% speed :)

results.content: D3 is one of the hardest libraries I have had trouble picking up, but I felt like I learned the basics through this course. At times the pace of the course felt off. For example the video would be quickly sped up when some code was added, so I had to pause the video to keep up. Also the instructor's voice delivery is somewhat bland, so I sped the video up to 1.5 and took breaks between videos. Overall pretty good course though.
results.content_html: D3 is one of the hardest libraries I have had trouble picking up, but I felt like I learned the basics through this course. At times the pace of the course felt off. For example the video would be quickly sped up when some code was added, so I had to pause the video to keep up. Also the instructor's voice delivery is somewhat bland, so I sped the video up to 1.5 and took breaks between videos. Overall pretty good course though.

results.content:
This course gave me the information that I have been missing about version 4 D3.js. I am now able to complete the graphs for a project I'm working on.

The instructor gave real examples and explained them well. He also gave plenty of resources to further your knowledge.

results.content:
The beginning of the course is ok, but at the end, the teacher explains less things. Some code is rapidly copied and pasted without deep understanding.
Some resources are missing.
I finished the course, but I'll have to work a lot with the documentation and tutorials to understand D3.js.

results.content: The course is indeed amazing, if you could add Doughnut Chart with Polylines and Word Cloud too examples it would be great. Thanks!
results.content_html: The course is indeed amazing, if you could add Doughnut Chart with Polylines and Word Cloud too examples it would be great. Thanks!

results.content: Very insightful information and classes.  Was a bit disappointed we only did a very simple stacked bar chart, but you can't go in depth on everything and keep the course short and sweet.  Overall great class.
results.content_html: Very insightful information and classes. Was a bit disappointed we only did a very simple stacked bar chart, but you can't go in depth on everything and keep the course short and sweet. Overall great class.

results.content: More or atleast some real world examples as an end project could have helped a lot but definitely a good overview of the important aspects of D3.
results.content_html: More or atleast some real world examples as an end project could have helped a lot but definitely a good overview of the important aspects of D3.

results.content: This has been a good course so far. I've been working with d3 for a while, but this class has enforced what I already know and is building on that foundation!
results.content_html: This has been a good course so far. I've been working with d3 for a while, but this class has enforced what I already know and is building on that foundation!

results.content: Clear and polished presentation style without being pedantic. Sets a good bar for video instruction. Explanations are broken into bite sized pieces. Very happy with this course.
results.content_html: Clear and polished presentation style without being pedantic. Sets a good bar for video instruction. Explanations are broken into bite sized pieces. Very happy with this course.

results.content: This was a great introduction to the D3 library!  It really shows how flexible D3 is for visualization.
results.content_html: This was a great introduction to the D3 library! It really shows how flexible D3 is for visualization.

results.content: good for graphics, basic geojson map, but no topojson which is why i put 3 star, i was disapponted.

results.content:
My favorite course on Udemy so far, if you want to learn a visualization library D3 is an incredible library, and this tutor is the perfect person to teach.

Jumping into D3 and reverse engineering other people's graphs is possible, but if you want to actually understand how it works so you can make anything imaginable, do this course.
results.content_html:
My favorite course on Udemy so far, if you want to learn a visualization library D3 is an incredible library, and this tutor is the perfect person to teach.

Jumping into D3 and reverse engineering other people's graphs is possible, but if you want to actually understand how it works so you can make anything imaginable, do this course.

results.content:
Takes a long and worthwhile journey through svg concepts to using d3js to create them. It can seem tedious if you are experienced with html & svg, however, understanding the technologies is important to leveraging d3.

More on data manipulation using group, nest and handling date/time data would be useful here.
results.content_html:
Takes a long and worthwhile journey through svg concepts to using d3js to create them. It can seem tedious if you are experienced with html & svg, however, understanding the technologies is important to leveraging d3.

More on data manipulation using group, nest and handling date/time data would be useful here.

results.content: I like the course a lot, it's a little annoying how we change certain files and then use the old version of that file in a later video. Not that much of an issue though.

results.content: The content is very well put together and I am learning a lot about D3.  The vocal delivery of the course is terrible! The only thing that is keeping me from becoming clinically depressed is the music track in the Lecture Notes section.  Material is good, but being able to have people relate to your emotional content is also important.

The only thing that is keeping me from becoming clinically depressed is the music track in the Lecture Notes section. Material is good, but being able to have people relate to your emotional content is also important.

results.content: Only through first few sections of material.  Install/setup instructions for Xampp and setting up your text editor didn't consider newer/different version of Xampp for Mac.  I had to search the forums for finding htdocs folder and moving file(s) there–due to some bug or technical limitation, the later was not straight forward.  Albeit easy solutions to find, being in this situation was unexpected.
